item.title: Awesome Diagrams and Graphs for Your Documentation
item.description: Diagrams.net (or Draw.io) is a free and open source cross-platform graph drawing software developed in HTML5 and JavaScript by UK-based JGraph Ltd in 2000. Its interface can be used to create diagrams such as flowcharts, network diagrams, organizational charts, or any other type of diagram. It is a useful alternative to more commercial tools like Microsoft Visio or Lucidchart. Getting Started You can immediately start by heading over to the web application at app.
